settings.heading: About Us
settings.description: Welcome to the World of Petite Penelope

settings.text:
Stephanie is the heart behind Petite Penelope (and mommy to Penelope — the heartbeat of it all).

With over a decade in the fashion and wellness world, she launched the brand after welcoming her baby girl - inspired by the joy of discovering beautifully curated pieces for herself and the little ones she loves.

Realizing how few children’s boutiques offered everything she desired — effortless style, exceptional quality, and elevated essentials designed for everyday life, she aspired to create the kind of modern destination she had been searching for.

Inspired by the boutiques in her hometown of Miami, life in New York City, and from her travels throughout Europe, Stephanie set out to capture that same sense of charm and discovery while creating a collection where fun and everyday life intertwine.

Petite Penelope was born to share that magic - a thoughtfully edited destination for elevated essentials, and timeless hard-to-find yet easy-to-shop pieces that make every day feel a bit more special.

Everything you love, all in one place.

settings.heading: Thoughtful Curation
settings.description: Each piece is intentionally chosen for its timeless craftsmanship, comfort, and quality — designed to be lived in, loved, and passed down.

settings.heading: A Destination for Little Luxuries
settings.description: A modern destination for forever-favorite pieces and meaningful gifts — where nostalgic charm meets ref inement, beautifully wrapped and thoughtfully curated to make their little worlds feel as sweet as the memories within them.

settings.heading: Everyday Elevated
settings.description: Classic silhouettes with thoughtful details, made for playtime, family time, and everything in between. Easy pieces you’ll reach for again and again.
